posts.author: Finley
posts.text: I just had the loveliest #cake at Davy and Elliott's #wedding reception

posts.author: Gab
posts.text: It's hot as balls at this #wedding! Whose idea was it to do a ceremony in a poorly ventilated room in the middle of June!

posts.author: Kim
posts.text: In next week's #concert, I'll be performing some Beethoven on my kazoo. Everyone is invited!

replies.author: Harley
replies.text: I'd have to check whether I can make that!

posts.author: Indigo
posts.text: Extended due to success! Jaden and I will perform for the third evening in a row at Ramsey's Pianobar! Come and listen to the sweet tones of Jaden's trombone and my jawharp for an evening #concert full of jazz!

posts.author: Harley
posts.text: As much as I want to hear how someone plays a trombone with a single arm, I really want to hear Charlie play! Shame, if it hadn't been a Beethoven #concert, I would've been there.

replies.author: Gab
replies.text: I also cancelled. I really can't miss Charlie and their band!

posts.author: Elliott
posts.text: Finley and I promised a friend to attend their Beethoven #concert, but I can't stand that. Give me #Ska any day!

posts.author: Davy
posts.text: There's no way I'll spend a whole evening listening to someone playing a jawharp! That'll be some #concert!

posts.author: Lindsay
posts.text: New! A trombone that you can play with just one hand! Great for a #concert!

replies.author: Elliott
replies.text: I know someone that bought one of those for their #concert next month!

posts.author: Charlie
posts.text: Our big #concert will be next month! Don't miss it!

posts.author: Davy
posts.text: Just got home from Billie and Adela's #wedding. Great party, but the #cake was awful.

replies.author: Elliott
replies.text: Yeah, I don't know what they put into that cake, but it was atrocious!

posts.author: Charlie
posts.text: At Adela's reception. I think I just knocked over a full glass of beer over the #wedding #cake! Hoping no one saw...

posts.author: Charlie
posts.text: My best friend Adela and Billie had such a beautiful #wedding ceremony, but we are all freezing out here so it's time for me to play some tunes and dance the night away to some #Ska.

replies.author: Finley
replies.text: I'm so sad I couldn't be there!

replies.author: Charlie
replies.text: Such a shame, I hope you'll get well soon!

posts.author: Indigo
posts.text: Tomorrow is my #birthday! Come and have some #cake!

posts.author: Nikita
posts.text: Had a bit of an #accident today. Forgot to put the handbrake on. It rolled right over me when I got something from the trunk. Broke my arm and the tree in my front yard has kicked the bucket.

replies.author: Elliott
replies.text: Always the clutz, @Nikita! Get well soon!

replies.author: Nikita
replies.text: Luckily it wasn't too bad. The doctor said it should heal quickly!

posts.author: Max
posts.text: I can't stand this #cast. How can I practice playing my trombone now?

posts.author: Adela
posts.text: I just saw Max getting hit by his best friend's car. He is in the hospital now and seems to be doing fine, but it will be some time before he can use that arm again. What a terrible #accident!

posts.author: Finley
posts.text: Kim and I where on the #escalator when it broke yesterday! Quite an #accident! Now we're both in the hospital. Kim broke his leg and my arm is in a #cast.

replies.author: Kim
replies.text: It was terrifying! My lawyer will certainly hear about this!
